documents.document: @sarahkendzior In picture 3 we see shows the proud parents of the corndog... are also corndogs. Sent back from the future, Terminator style?

@malki The Gambler's Fallacy only applies when the probabilities are independent.
@YrBFFAnna @edquish @JAMyerson The fight against Trump will in fact make America great again.
@malki Fortunately it doesn't look like he'll give us that chance.
@malki It's a good joke but it will weaken the resistance if we start making unjustifiable objections "just because it's Trump".
@ZachWeiner Any word on how long they had to wait for all the other things to stop coming out first?
@sarahkendzior Point 7, today, in particular. What exactly did that second executive order say?
@AnnaHollinrake What!? HOW OLD ARE YOU REALLY
@AnnaHollinrake Can I play too? You have 4 likes, so my guilty pleasure game: One Finger Death Punch.
@Benjy_Greenberg @clmazin Might be hard, the majority have probably paid already (income taxed at source by their employer).
@2010LeeHurst Next you should compile a complete code of police ethics by asking how people would act in various Saw movie scenarios.
@botherer Tune in tomorrow when he asks how you'd act in a variety of Saw movie scenarios, to extrapolate a law enforcement code of ethics.
@jayrosen_nyu And now the question becomes, is Alex Jones' word more reliable than the white house's? Right now the answer might be yes.
@PatrickRothfuss @JustinMcElroy @travismcelroy @griffinmcelroy You mean headcanon... unless they're ammunition for your skull launcher.
@joeshreffler @jayrosen_nyu @zannerina @Slate Ask a question, if she lies, play a clip that disproves the lie, have security escort her out.
@royalviking04 @jayrosen_nyu @Lawrence @Slate That's the greatest love of all!
@mcclure111 Upgrade rarely fails. Downgrade... no chance. (E.g. if you want to try it out with the special Google Daydream 4.5 build? Nope.)
@o_oskarsson @3liza not witch counters?
@botherer The sequels were very much like that, but I don't remember the first one being too bad.
@qprmicky @gothytim @BarristerSecret @TheMightyGusset Then you have nothing to worry about from a second referendum.
@qprmicky @gothytim @BarristerSecret @TheMightyGusset I don't see a good option except another referendum with the real options spelled out.
@qprmicky @gothytim @BarristerSecret @TheMightyGusset I really doubt people were voting for "full English Brexit with all the consequences".
@qprmicky @gothytim @BarristerSecret @TheMightyGusset It's tough. Leaving SM devastates the economy, and half-assing it makes nobody happy.
@qprmicky @gothytim @BarristerSecret @TheMightyGusset Or do you mean, since the referendum didn't capture that information, we need another?
@qprmicky @gothytim @BarristerSecret @TheMightyGusset True. You think every voter who voted "out" meant "out at any cost"? Seems unlikely.
@qprmicky @gothytim @BarristerSecret @TheMightyGusset Anyway the vote said to leave the EU, not how. Good for Parliament to decide details.
@qprmicky @gothytim @BarristerSecret @TheMightyGusset Well they voted for those MPs too. (But not for the prime minister, funnily enough.)
@qprmicky @gothytim @BarristerSecret @TheMightyGusset If it comes down to UK parliament vs UK govt, if you pick parliament, that's anti UK?
@mcclure111 Sounds like you're trying to invent namespaces - write string::isDigit x. (Or just isDigit x, if you've said "using string;".)
@RealGDT @RaphLife World of Goo.

@meowza @MinekosMarket Heh! It's like the set for a western.
@Pentadact Sure, it's about right. To keep it fresh it could keep growing slowly. (I never explode greenies, so the board never changes rn).

@Pentadact Get teleporters with hammer/blade/heal upgrade (one of each, somewhere on the board) and add teleporter upgrade to everything.
@Pentadact My tips: don't be afraid of pushing enemies off the board, and Always Be Teleporting: take teleporters whenever offered.
@Pentadact It took me a while to get into the rhythm of this new build, but I think I've got it now. Teleporters arâ€¦ https://t.co/NgB4S8jIcx
@radix42 @LeenaVanD @mcclure111 (The negative connotation in case being to associate "triggering" with a self-indulgent tantrum.)
@radix42 @LeenaVanD @mcclure111 Well, not "inverse", really - a technical term gained negative connotations through broader use. As normal.
@radix42 @LeenaVanD @mcclure111 Yeah, policing language never works. Good example of an inverse euphemism treadmill. https://t.co/6ZX5mDpBNx
@HeatSig In the grim darkness of the far future, there is only CrimeVerb.
@simonmc @AndreuEscriva @GeorgeMonbiot And/or planes too cheap, yes.
@simonmc @AndreuEscriva @GeorgeMonbiot Talking about one trip, yes. But if there was less demand for planes overall, fewer planes would fly.
Wow, this thing is polished. They deserve to sell many, many copies. https://t.co/sqO1TalPFT
@nuthaven @malki They don't WANT to screw the poor, just want government as small as possible. Making it dysfunctional gives them an excuse.
@marinamarcroft @paulkrugman The joke is that the ACA *is* Obamacare, but Republicans like one and hate the other. https://t.co/P8YmACXcMg
@davidfrum Averages can be v. misleading. e.g. Post Black Death here: the average age of death was the LEAST common. https://t.co/HqzaerIyER
@paulkrugman If they're smart, they'll replace it with the Affordable Care Act.
@botherer Or, or, bear with me here, there's an accident and the train involved worries that they will be replaced, but all is forgiven.
@Pentadact Why would you need an acid neutraliser when teleporter + hammer upgrade knocks them off the board so easily?
@SUPGVNetwork So he's killed over 100 people at this point? That toddler is a menace. Minor or not, I say we arrest him.
@TychoBrahe That's an amazing answer!
@TychoBrahe What boardgame are you best at?
@ZachWeiner Now that is a big 'but'.
@mcclure111 @terrycavanagh Now I want it to be called Hasty Heist.
@mcclure111 In that case my next move would be to abandon coroutines and just keep checking the current time in FixedUpdate.
@mcclure111 Or something like that anyway - key is to use absolute time so your errors don't compound together.
@mcclure111 void WaitUntilTimestamp(float target){ while(Time.realtimeSS < target){ yield return WaitForSeconds(target - Time.realtimeSS); }
@mcclure111 Instead of WaitForSeconds(duration to wait), make a function that waits for a certain RealTimeSinceStartup to have passed.
@mcclure111 Do you get better results calling it from FixedUpdate?
@TychoBrahe Which of the Mane Six are you?
@AnnaHollinrake Oh no... now there's two of them!
@AnnaHollinrake Can't put my finger on it.... did you do something with your hair?
@terrycavanagh At-man and robbin'
@AnnaHollinrake Nooo it won't let me watch in Germany... why the heck am I paying for a TV license then?
@PhilipPullman Doesn't matter what I think, it's what the audience thinks. Different packaging for different folks.
@PhilipPullman Disagree - at their best they can be a spoonful of sugar to help the medicine go down. c.f. John Oliver.
@1aprildaniels @mcclure111 You'd probably enjoy The Authority, which is the superhero version of that story.
@botherer Trump would make for a nice face-turn.
@malki Ah, so that's how they get you. Ransomstipation.
@davidaxelrod The strategy: realize that nobody should have to work any more, thanks to our robot servants. We live in the 50's dream!
@TychoBrahe Originally "the dock is tacked", a nautical phrase.
@davidfrum In a way this seems positive - when their plans become reality, there's a limit to how long voters can stay in denial. Hopefully?
@ZachWeiner Like, pomegranate? That's a pain in the ass to eat.
@UnkelFred @domholding @GeorgeMonbiot Just out of curiousity, who do you blame for the attack on Ukraine?
@RivalThoughtsTo @BrendanNyhan Thanks. Let's all hope it doesn't come to that.
@RivalThoughtsTo @BrendanNyhan Soros is a US citizen. Slim didn't release any info AFAICT? (Trump accused him, but there's no evidence.)
@RivalThoughtsTo @BrendanNyhan If Putin is not involved, someone is spending billions of dollars to frame him.
@RivalThoughtsTo @BrendanNyhan They've consistently used Russian language settings & time zones, and their resources suggest state funding.
@RivalThoughtsTo @BrendanNyhan We know who did it, a team codenamed Fancy Bear. They've been operating since 2007. https://t.co/oga5mXfULU
@RivalThoughtsTo @BrendanNyhan But I don't think Putin will actually push that far. US just needs to be clear what it will/won't tolerate.
@RivalThoughtsTo @BrendanNyhan Putin attacked Ukraine, Syria, and the US election. He's not going to stop. If opposing him = WW3 so be it.
@RivalThoughtsTo @BrendanNyhan I guess you mean that you don't believe it? Which bit don't you believe? The war crimes are pretty obvious...
@RivalThoughtsTo @BrendanNyhan Well he's committing war crimes in Syria right now. I'm sure he'll get around to the US eventually.
@mcclure111 @PulpLibrarian "The only goal is to completely in political games." Best phrase I've read all day.
@welshdai15 @GeorgeMonbiot @guardian Some developed countries already have negative growth; eventually I think it'll be true globally.
@welshdai15 @GeorgeMonbiot @guardian Truth - I can't believe the Catholic church still opposes contraception. It's humanity's one hope.
@streetswept @GeorgeMonbiot After this year, I'm seeing a LOT more interest in politics. People are less complacent.
@ZachWeiner Blithe unconcern.
@ibejac @anders_aslund @davidfrum @Gazprom @exxonmobil Evidence? It makes sense, but that doesn't make it true. #ConspiracyTheoryBias
@GamblingExpert2 @Snowden @jack Snowden's gf is living in Russia with him, so probably not long ago.
@lib_memes Unfortunate use of the word "leave" there.
@HHSidhu @bartongellman @sherean So call him as an enemy combatant based on no evidence, and throw him in Guantanamo? He won't be the first.
@LindseyGrahamSC Eastern Time?
@JohnnyDynamo911 @jhamby @russchoma By the standards EVERY OTHER president has ever been held to, Trump is clearly behaving unethically.
@JohnnyDynamo911 @jhamby @russchoma Not about dislike. You said "show what law he broke", which covers "illegal", not the other two things.
@JohnnyDynamo911 @jhamby @russchoma Your argument is, if we aren't literally arresting him, we can't talk about his behaviour. #Bullshit
